item.title: Repetition in musicals with tidytext
item.description: Lately I have been wondering how to quantify how repetitive a text is, specifically how repetitive are the lyrics to songs. Iâ€™m by no means the first one, Colin Morris did a great piece on language compression with his Are Pop Lyrics Getting More Repetitive? which i highly recommend you go read. Instead of looking at pop lyrics will we instead be focusing some popular musicals to see if general patterns emerge within each show.
